section.heading: Settlement of accounts as prima facie evidence only.
section.text: Except as provided by section 16-3111 , in actions:

para.text: for an accounting, by legatees or next to kin against personal representatives, or wards against their guardians; or
to subject the real estate of decedents to the payment of their debts, by creditors against personal representatives, or against heirs or devisees —

section.aftertext: a prior settlement of accounts in the Probate Court is only prima facie evidence as to the correctness of the accounts.
